author: felicity
msg: Fixed up Razor2 check code some more.  We now support both razor object
layouts (<2.14 and >=2.14).  Got rid of extra variable in Razor2 code.

author: felicity
msg: mass-check now shows status every $updates messages and at 100%

author: felicity
msg: fixed status displays to not give "illegal modulus 0" errors on small checks.

author: msquadrat
msg: Some tweaks to the --mid code (again): Make the mid meta RE safe and remove the time part (we don't need to create unique MIDs, this is just for logging)
